description: Rejects automatically generated business-friendly metadata for your Amazon DataZone assets.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain.

parameters.name: rejectChoices
parameters.description: Specifies the prediction (aka, the automatically generated piece of metadata) and the target (for example, a column name) that can be rejected. (dict) --- The details of the automatically generated business metadata that is rejected. predictionChoices (list) --- Specifies the the automatically generated business metadata that can be rejected. (integer) --- Specifies the target (for example, a column name) where a prediction can be rejected.

nested_params.name: predictionChoices
nested_params.description: Specifies the the automatically generated business metadata that can be rejected.

nested_params.name: predictionTarget
nested_params.description: Specifies the target (for example, a column name) where a prediction can be rejected.

parameters.name: rejectRule
parameters.description: Specifies the rule (or the conditions) under which a prediction can be rejected. rule (string) --- Specifies whether you want to reject the top prediction for all targets or none. threshold (float) --- The confidence score that specifies the condition at which a prediction can be rejected.

nested_params.name: rule
nested_params.description: Specifies whether you want to reject the top prediction for all targets or none.

nested_params.name: threshold
nested_params.description: The confidence score that specifies the condition at which a prediction can be rejected.

nested_items.name: assetRevision
nested_items.description: The revision that is to be made to the asset.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain.
